attributes.action: Limit the use of Lighting Advertisements during the hours of darkness and the extinguishing of unnecessary lights in Commercial premises
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the ever increasing concerns over global warming, it is inconceivable that unnecessary Commercial Advertising emblazed in lights is permitted during early hours and the number of commercial buidings with internal lights on whilst the building is virtually empty is plainly a waste of electricity and is adding to global warming.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
